arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah names his four footballing heroes including legendary former team-mate
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah has opened up on the players whom he drew inspiration from - Ronaldo and Francesco Totti among them - as the Liverpool frontman eyes a clean sweep of trophies

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah reveals advice he received from Arsene Wenger
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah received game-changing advice from Arsene Wenger.

arts.ttl: Barcelona join Saudi sides in Mohamed Salah pursuit
arts.sum: Barcelona are interested in signing Mohamed Salah from Liverpool, should the forward not agree a new deal. Salah’s contract at Liverpool expires in the summer and there has been no public progress on an extension. The 32-year-old posted a cryptic message on social media earlier this month, writing on X: “No matter what happens, I […] The post Barcelona join Saudi sides in Mohamed Salah pursuit first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: 'Mohamed Salah told me I'm Liverpool's best player - Arne Slot doesn't think I'm ready'
arts.sum: Liverpool wonderkid Stefan Bajcetic enjoyed a meteoric rise two seasons ago but was sent out on loan by new manager Arne Slot after having his career derailed by injuries

arts.ttl: ‘Big dream’: Mo Salah successor desperate for Liverpool transfer; he’s outscoring Slot’s key man
arts.sum: Mo Salah has to be considered one of the all-time greats in Premier League history. The numbers alone, increasingly astonishing by the day, would at the very least indicate that – even without the sufficient evidence provided by the eye test. With that in mind, you could forgive the raising of a few brows at […] The post ‘Big dream’: Mo Salah successor desperate for Liverpool transfer; he’s outscoring Slot’s key man appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: AFCON kit drop: Rating Puma's Egypt, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Morocco, Senegal jerseys
arts.sum: Puma have gone early with the first batch of brand-new home and away kits for AFCON 2025. ESPN breaks down the best (and worst) of the lot.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah contract update as Liverpool open to extension compromise: Premier League over Saudi Arabia future
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah and Liverpool may reach a compromise on a two-year contract extension on the forward's current contract given the attacker's clear preference to stay at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Salah sets ambitious target for Liverpool this season
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah has said Liverpool are aiming to ‘win it all’ under Arne Slot this season. Liverpool have started the season in fine form under the new head coach and sit top of the Premier League table at November’s international break. A 2-0 win over Aston Villa last weekend extended their advantage to five […] The post Salah sets ambitious target for Liverpool this season first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah Dismisses Liverpool 'Underdog' Status in Premier League Title Race
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah wants his team and the city to believe that this team can fight for the Premier League in Arne Slot's first season.

arts.ttl: Mo Salah reveals Arsene Wenger's SECRET ADVICE for success
arts.sum: Speaking at a sponsor's event with Standard Chartered with fellow Liverpool players Alisson and Andy Robertson, Mohamed Salah revealed that Arsenal's legendary (former) manager Arsene Wenger once gave him a piece of advice that, it would seem, has been fundamental to his tremendous success as a footballer. It's hard to argue that Wenger's advice hasn't played an enormous part in Salah's success at Liverpool, because it so accurate describes the way he plays the game as a player for the big moments.
